tls:text.tls:srcline: 韶州刺史韋璩及諸官僚三十餘人、儒士三十餘人，

tls:span.tls:note: 死屍： THERE ARE ONLY FIGURATIVELY LIVING CORPSES
Note that the familiar address is intratextual and not directed at the reader.
Parenthesis between clauses, though, not intrasentential.
Recognising this as a qualifying afterthought is crucial to the interpretation of this tricky passage. It is not necessarily correct, but it is highly relevant as an interpretive possibility.
梁可拔 / 拔梁 : but note that this is not within one sentence. I consider this example as interestingly spurious.
魏可舉 : but note that this is not within one sentence. I consider this example as interestingly spurious. 舉魏，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是時會中有異學梵志五百人俱。

tls:span.tls:note: A series of three unmarked conditionals (which one could in turn pedantically register as ASYNDETA).
Main caesura after 佛言 in the middle of a four-character line, giving a staccato effect.
Again, the break after 問曰 is arhythmic. The line, here as elsewhere has a multiple of four characters

tls:text.tls:srcline: 世尊，往昔 無數劫時，

tls:span.tls:note: 以手 is there only to fill the quadrisyllabic rhythm.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而小易得卿相將軍之賞祿。
今舉動而與天下之為讎，

tls:span.tls:note: 悖狂 . PWY reconstructs 狂 with a final s.
虛靜 . 靜 has the rising tone (or whatever corresponded to it in old Chinese), but the character has mysteriously dropped out of the TLS Chinese phonology system.
戰鬥 Two falling tones, unfortunately:

tls:text.tls:srcline: 至天地之消散也不死不衰者謂“常”。

tls:span.tls:note: 父母 I take this to mean "parents", but one might take it as an additive construction.
狂簡 Both words have guttural initials, but these are not identical.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 子見齊衰者、冕衣裳者與瞽者，
摶扶搖羊角而上者九萬里
瞽者无以與乎文章之觀，

tls:span.tls:note: 彼是 . Note that 是 has rising tone.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此固以失霸王之道三矣。

tls:span.tls:note: Change of type of subject. No CRESCENDO.
The third member has 民心 for 民不 .
Line 6 does not continue the ANAPHORA of 民 .
Last member deviating, but SHORTER, and not a case of crescendo.
It is the remark on putting into practice what has passed on to one that is the important and non-trivial one. The other two are un-surprising and conventional.
The deviating member of the TRICOLON is, as predicted, the third member, the first two exhibiting PARISON.
The addition of 也 to produce this effect is truly extraordinary. But note that that deviation marks the end of the unit.
人 "the person one is" as in 為人

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舍舟航而濟乎瀆者，末矣!
舍五經而濟乎道者，末矣!

tls:span.tls:note: 有祝鮀之佞 / 有宋朝之美
End of parable marked by a double enjambement. Part of the story-telling technique.
The division of the two distinct parts of this sorites is by crescendo at the end of the first part.
This goes on into the next record.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而未有能免於貧賤死夭之禍也。

tls:span.tls:note: 至新頭河 / 既至河所
癡 / 無所知 . Note the 愚人 in the line above.
如彼貧人 / 亦復如是。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 如彼飲水愚人等無有異。

tls:span.tls:note: 如彼愚人等 / 無有異
悉皆美好 / 無一惡者
徒喪其功 / 空無所獲
如彼數錢者 / 其事亦如是

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而聖王明君善知而道之者也。

tls:span.tls:note: 好言 / 繁辭 One wonders whether this is not a Latin-style HENDIADYS.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 自撲墮地 氣絕而死。
父母不逆 即便聽之。
時有夫妻二人 貧餓困乏，
且予與其死於臣之手也，
無寧死於二三子之手乎！
毗舍闍者喻於眾魔及以外道。
人天五道資用之具皆從中出。
天雨溼爛喻於放逸敗壞善行。
不殺戒者即佛法身最上妙因，
是故行者應當精心持不殺戒。
精勤勞苦作小牛者喻於名聞互相是非。
夫為學者研思精微博通多識。
生死愚人為愛奴僕亦復如是。
正念覺意道品財寶悉皆散失。
即從天下 前詣佛所。
即時群僚 前後圍繞 欲得聽聞。
唯第四天 宮殿湛然。

tls:span.tls:note: 衣養 . Homorganic link: ls-l. Unvoiced initial precedes voiced.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 貴賤賢不肖之所以別也。
今人主非使賞罰之威利出於己也，

tls:span.tls:note: CRESCENDO: the last member deviating by being more extended.
Non-standard deviant third member, breaking the pattern.
Note that all three structures are different, and yet the position of the repeated word is the same.
What punctuates and links this whole passage is the repetition of the construction in 則見 .
This is a most elaborate system of parallelistic structures.
Cf. preceding: 子曰： 「由也， 千乘之國， 可使治其賦也， 不知其仁也。」
主人： or should we take this as simple repetitio?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 或為縣官水火盜賊之所侵奪，

tls:span.tls:note: 常 begins the two lines (or: cola)
The relation to line 2 is fortuitous, not structurally or rhetorically significant, if I am not mistaken.
夫子 . This kind of emphatic two-character ANAPHORA has a special effect here that goes beyond pure aesthetics. There is a semantic reason why the second instance is not pronominalised to 其 .

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吾無行而不與二三子者，

tls:span.tls:note: 吾 , almost like ANAPHORA, but not quite.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 在鵲封竹園與諸大比丘菩薩摩訶薩及諸八部三萬六千人俱。
是時會中有異學梵志五百人俱。

tls:span.tls:note: Lines 3 and four end in 名 .

The repetitive ending in 也 contrasts significantly with the common pattern ... 矣； ... 也。 In general, of course, one will have to disregard EPIPHORA in 也 , but we shall find that there are cases where this type of trivial EPIPHORA seems very much part of the intended rhetorical pattern.
Note the elliptic quality of line 5, and the climactic CRESCENDO in line 8.
Note that this continues from previous records and involves two cases of ARHYTHMIA.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則不能免人間法令之禍。

tls:span.tls:note: Note the striking crescendo in the last line.
Deviating first member, which is remarkable. Line 5 should not be taken to suggest sub-syllabic 兒 .
The rhythmically deviant third member is unusual: the tendency is for the last member to differ.
Last member longer, as usual. Second member shorter, unusually.
不亦 x 乎 is a rhetorical question pattern repeated three times. The third time, in the context of crescendo, the line is one character longer, thus creating an only approximate ISOCOLON.
There is a deviation in the second member, so one should call this approximate.
ISOCOLON imperfect in that (unusually) the first member deviates.
Last two members expanded, as is common.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不若以非馬喻馬之非馬也。
有未始有夫未始有无也者。

tls:span.tls:note: 有 and 無 constitute the antithesis
十有三 , the last member being rhythmically expanded.
不知其仁也 . Triple anaphora. Cf. preceding 子曰： 「由也， 千乘之國， 可使治其賦也， 不知其仁也。」
可以對 . As prescribed, deviation in the last parallel member.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 讚最上最上乘法修行定成佛。
法鼓已建， 法炬已照。

tls:span.tls:note: Not an entirely clear case, but well worth considering

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「汝色聲香味莫復更來使我見也。」
而此人者道我恆喜瞋恚作事倉卒。
不解如來法王為眾生故
見他頭陀苦行山林曠野塚間樹下。
云何頃來而不造作如是之樓？」
「汝色聲香味莫復更來使我見也。」
凡物由亡生。 (亡 written as 望)

tls:span.tls:note: Confucius is proud to follow the 野人 .
而 is added to fill out the rhythm.
Both 亦 and 復 would be sufficient by themselves.
賓客 : one of these words would have sufficed. The reference is not specifically to "various kinds of". If it were, we would not diagnose REDUNDANTIA.

求得 is redundant since one cannot very well see what one does not wish to obtain... The quadrisyllabism cultivated here is isolated. Maybe it should not be categorised under quadrisyllabism after all, but it certainly is a case of redundantia.
心 strictly redundant since one cannot think with anything else.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 號曰華光如來應供正遍知明行足善逝世間解無上士調御丈夫天人師佛世尊。

tls:span.tls:note: 白刃在前 / 斧鑕在後
用一國之兵 / 成兩國之功
Embedded case, for which one should probably establish a separate category.
Repetition of 於 . 怨 / 功 antithetic.
Note the VARIATIO in the last part.

Note that it is sometimes tempting to count the grammatical particles, sometimes not. Could there really be aestetic ambivalence in this respect? One wonders. ... There PARISON, in any case, is also imperfect.
A typical instance of contrastive parallelism. The METAPHORA in 母 adds an element of CRESCENDO.
故 supernumerary, as often. Exceedingly close parallelism.
得之若驚 / 失之若驚
Note the deviation in the penultimate member.
Interrupted at line 10 by the emphasis on ANTITHESIS: 則不然
Note that here as elsewhere the main subject must be counted out.
The slight break of the PARISON does not seem to matter.
賞罰 resumes in a characteristic pattern which probably should get its own name.
See the beginning of the chapter.
責怨 . Homorganic link: g-q, semiguttural.
畏恐 . The more general comes last. Problematic.
闊遠 . The most general comes last. Problematic.
服從 . Initial for 從 unclear.
服從 . Initial for 從 unclear.
獄訟 . Combination k-s euphonically acceptable. See also 腹心 which has similar regularities.

敬忠 . The euphonic word order would be and several times elsewhere is 忠敬 . Perhaps 敬 "respectfully" modifies 忠 "do one's loyal best"? Note that the final alliteration does nothing to explain the word order here.
揖讓 . Non-homorganic link: b-n. Motivated by the order in which the actions are performed?
困窮 . Non-homorganic link: ns-g. 困 is "high tone" (high-toned are all words beginning with a unvoiced consonant; low-toned are all other words beginning with a voiced consonant).
逕庭 . 庭 possibly fourth tone.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 延陵卓子乘蒼龍挑（翟）文之乘，

tls:span.tls:note: The case is complex, but noteworthy. 甲兵 is resumed just by 兵 .
疏賤必賞／近愛必誅／疏賤／近愛 This chapter ends in a highly complex pattern of ANADIPLOSIS and repetition.
This is a very large intricate repetitive structure which covers several records in TLS.
/Npr.../Npr.../. REPETITIO of the same initial word in two consecutive cola/lines.The variable size of the units identified creates different types of ANAPHORA.
強 is used to flatter the King.
Body. Rare case in early prose.
This continues into the following records.
請 SEE ALSO 嘗試 ELSEWHERE
以刀箭斫射 = 以刀砍，以箭射
情實 However, the first character may be taken to modify the second.
禮貌 However, the first character may be taken to modify the second.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而小易得卿相將軍之賞祿。
而未有能免於貧賤死夭之禍也。
自天地之剖判以至于今。
則不能免人間法令之禍。
而外無刑罰法誅之禍者，
唯夫與天地之剖判也具生，
唯夫與天地之剖判也具生，

tls:span.tls:note: 畋獵 . When two binomes are strung together, it is worth investigating whether it tends to be the second - if any - that is euphonic.
忠信 . Note that the euphonic combination comes last, as a kind of crescendo.
離析 . Note that the second member is euphonic.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 徙天下豪富於咸陽十二萬戶。

tls:span.tls:note: 賓服 . But perhaps 賓 must be taken adverbially, in which case the word order is grammatically imposed.
教誨 . Assuming that 教 has the level tone here. Below, we cannot assume that 近 has the falling tone.
貧乏：乏 has entering tone p.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 背負青天而莫之夭閼者，

tls:span.tls:note: NB: This is only ONE complex morpheme.
冥 . The darkness of this sea stands for the sea itself.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是時會中有異學梵志五百人俱。

tls:span.tls:note: 六枚／七枚 counted as contracted?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 惠能大師於大梵寺講堂中升高座，
同請大師說摩訶般若波羅蜜法。

tls:span.tls:note: Note that this features is pervasive in 白文 .

tls:text.tls:srcline: 典領諸國八萬四千聚落、
一時佛在舍衛國祗樹給孤獨園，
由其爾時 惡不善心，
檀若世質 以為明人。
一時佛在王舍城竹園中止。

tls:span.tls:note: Note the rhythmic tolerance with phonetic transcriptions.
Note that what follows is a deviating longer phrase.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則臣將乘於賢以劫其君；
且而與其從辟人之士也，

tls:span.tls:note: Both repeated subject and changed new subject omitted.
Line three is out of line with the parallelism because it does not refer to two persons.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 五大夫趙嬰、五大夫楊樛從，

tls:span.tls:note: 有聞 . This is a mini-cycle.
名 ends line 4 and comes near the beginning of line 5.
For semantic reasons this cannot be taken as a case of EPIPHORA, I think one must argue. Thus EPIPHORA is not purely a matter of the distribution of words.
足 . 故也 intervenes. But the underlying form seems to be clearly present.
由 . The two pieces of dialogue are not adjacent. The interposed reaction by Zilu makes this an impure anadiplosis. Is it one at all?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 且有大覺而後知此其大夢也。

tls:span.tls:note: 或 is repeated in the same line in the same function. One could call this "intralinear".
Note that lines 8 and 9 should probably be read as one line. The passage is framed in by reference to 韓 .

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今人主非使賞罰之威利出於己也，

tls:span.tls:note: 服／狗 . Note the active-passive contrast in 服 .

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則是世主之危甚於簡公、宋君也。

tls:span.tls:note: 勸 . Perhaps this is after all best seens as RESUMPTIO along with the others.
知／止／至 CHECK THE OLD CHINESE!!!
奪予 . Homorganic link apparently absent: t-i

tls:text.tls:srcline: 短長、大小、方圓、堅脆、輕重、白黑之謂理。
短長、大小、方圓、堅脆、輕重、白黑之謂理。
其餘則日月至焉而已矣。」

tls:span.tls:note: 其 . The two 其 do not have the same reference and one is almost tempted to call this pseudo-anaphora.
曰：「仁矣乎？」曰：「未知；焉得仁？」 See below.
曰：「仁矣乎？」曰：「未知；焉得仁？」 Earlier parts of the dialogue end with the same sequence.

One might be tempted claim ELLIPSIS of a 者 , but it is clear that these constructions without 者 are common. Is one entitled to call this a common ELLIPSIS? Where is the line between the rhetorical device and a grammatical rule? This raises many questions.

Structually, this is a bipartite structure with a bipartite first element. I register it here as a heterogeneous tripartite structure in order to keep track of such superficially tripartite structures in predominantly tripartite contexts.
This involves RESUMPTIO-STAGGERED, and in addition a clear case of CRESCENDO.
It is hard to classify this rhetorical device properly, but one would certainly not want to say that this saying represented ORATIO SOLUTA.
Actions are specified and then classified with 也 phrases.
This is a delicately patterned case of unmarked with marked conditionals.
The same graph stands for different words with different pronunciations.
The same graph stands for different words with different pronunciations.

臣聞之曰 . The repetition of this phrase throughout the opening passage is striking. It is as if this phrase is used as a kind of punctuation of the text. Significantly, this repetition goes across TLS record boundaries and is therefore inconvenient to record.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其頓首戴羽為將軍斷死於前

tls:span.tls:note: The persistent recurrence of 謀臣 in this chapter is striking and significant.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此固以失霸王之道三矣。

tls:span.tls:note: 罰 Quintuple REPETITIO amounting to a kind of COMMORATIO on the theme.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故群臣其言大而功小者
以為不當名也害甚於大功，

tls:span.tls:note: 兮似 . The intervening rhyming lines recur in ch. 56 and are often taken to belong there, in which case we would have straightforward PARALLELISM here.
The REPETITIO of 能 strengthens the PARISON.
求 is almost a case of repetitive COMMORATIO "dwelling on a theme", but this is a larger-scale form of a different type.
不知 . This cannot be construed as cyclic.
乞 Is this really a rhetorical figure? We note it in order to be able to discuss questions like this on the basis of concrete examples compared.
之生也 . But it makes no great sense to register this as long as the passage remains opaque.
比及三年 . See preceding record.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 韶州刺史韋璩及諸官僚三十餘人、儒士三十餘人，
同請大師說摩訶般若波羅蜜法。
庸詎知吾所謂知之非不知邪？
庸詎知吾所謂不知之非知邪？

tls:span.tls:note: Note the addition of the 也 in lines 4 and 5.
鄉人皆好 , 鄉人皆惡
The two characters are mentioned and not used. They are marginal cases of quotation for which in English we do use quotation marks.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 母子三人 俱共向佛 叩頭求哀：
即遣使者 詣王舍城 請佛及僧：
即遣使者 詣王舍城 請佛及僧：
貴賤賢不肖之所以別也。
貴賤賢不肖之所以別也。

tls:span.tls:note: 清濁 . Note that in old Chinese 濁 probably ended in a guttural.
清濁 . Note that in old Chinese 濁 probably ended in a guttural.
動靜 . Note that 動 is rising tone, and so is 靜 .

tls:text.tls:srcline: 短長、大小、方圓、堅脆、輕重、白黑之謂理。
短長、大小、方圓、堅脆、輕重、白黑之謂理。
云何頃來而不造作如是之樓？」

tls:span.tls:note: 君子多乎哉？ Note that the rhetorical questions is explicitly answered, for confirmation!
夫何為哉？ What follows are NOT actions, but proof of his inaction.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予惡乎知說生之非惑邪！
予惡乎知惡死之非弱喪
吾所待又有待而然者邪？

tls:span.tls:note: Note that these last two questions are NOT a DILEMMA.
The typical case of staggering involves independent sentences.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此弊惡驢須臾之頃盡破我器。
延陵卓子乘蒼龍挑（翟）文之乘，

tls:span.tls:note: Here the connectives are 故，是以 .
Note how this SORITES links in a preceding closely similar rhetorical form.
知 / 欲 ; 勇 / 藝

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天下固以量秦之謀臣一矣。
淨飯王子 厥名悉達。
應王金輪 典四天下。

tls:span.tls:note: ??This quotation seems to show a sense for archaic style, but of course this is hard to prove.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 德行：顏淵、閔子騫、冉伯牛、仲弓；
伯夷、叔齊、虞仲、夷逸、朱張、柳下惠、少連。
凡物由亡生。 (亡 written as 望)
則群臣為子之、田常不難矣。
所以使庸主能止盜跖也；
雖有十堯舜而亦不能治者，

tls:span.tls:note: 有 ... 使萬物 / 有 ... 使群臣
This might well be an accidental KUKLOS, and it is a useful reminder that not everything that physically is a KUKLOS need be an intended rhetorical form.
The lines begin and end in 名 .
Impure example, but clearly relevant to the form.
與！ This hovers between an ordinary KUKLOS involving the repetition of a particle, and a KUKLOS-STRUCTURAL.
Note that line 8 goes with line 2 and is not relevant to the KUKLOS.
See beginning of this long dialogue.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予惡乎知說生之非惑邪！
予惡乎知夫死者不悔其始之蘄生乎！

tls:span.tls:note: 南冥 is being commented on.
One would expect the order 忠信
Lines 1-3 and 6-8 are parallel, with a hint of length CRESCENDO.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「汝色聲香味莫復更來使我見也。」
而此五陰恆以生老病死無量苦惱搒笞眾生。
夫上侵弱君而下傷人民者，
夫上侵弱君而下傷人民者，

tls:span.tls:note: 上侵弱君 / 下傷人民

tls:text.tls:srcline: 民獨知兕虎之有爪角也，
而莫知萬物之盡有爪角也，
勸請：“世尊， 轉於法輪，
世尊，往昔 無數劫時，

tls:span.tls:note: The third clearly the most important.
First member longer. Why does this not constitute the rhetorical device DECRESCENDO? We need to be able to give convincing answers to this order of questions.
This exemplified the "law of increasing length of members".

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則不能免人間法令之禍。

tls:span.tls:note: The longest line is the last.
Problematic case. The heavier phrase 愛人 comes in the second, not in the first member of the PARISON.
The point about marriage is the one that is elaborated.
The first five members have a single phrase second part after the 而 , the last one has a two-sentence second part.
Lines 10 and 11 go together as what is to be done after death.
府庫不盈 / 囷倉空虛，
泥洹 in lines 5 and 6 is used in different functions.
會 used first verbally, and then, typically, as the resulting nab of the action first mentioned. The order is not arbitrary.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舍舟航而濟乎瀆者，末矣!
舍五經而濟乎道者，末矣!

tls:span.tls:note: 一 "one" versus "the whole of" in 一臣 ... 一國
斯 twice in two different meanings.
apparently the punctuator of this text found an aposiopesis here

tls:text.tls:srcline: 菩薩、摩訶薩不親近國王、王子、大臣、官長；
帥熊、羆、狼、豹、貙、虎為前驅，
子路、曾皙、冉有、公西華侍坐。
其頓首戴羽為將軍斷死於前
大旱金石流土山焦而不熱。
而未知有无之果孰有孰无也。

tls:span.tls:note: ZHUANG makes up a source, and then quotes it.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 代、上黨不戰而畢為秦矣，
中山、呼沱以北不戰而畢為燕矣。
安住菩薩行處及親近處，

tls:span.tls:note: HF does not present this as a historical fact. It is rather a spoof on current ways of telling political success stories.
This is a parody of human petty reasoning.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故（固）以無為無思為虛也。
夫故（固）以無為無思為虛者，
夫上侵弱君而下傷人民者，

tls:span.tls:note: The ANADIPLOSIS with 夫唯 is remarkably common.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其名曰阿 若憍陳如。

tls:span.tls:note: Extreme case of ENJAMBEMENT within a transcribed name. One might even diagnose ARHYTHMIA.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 護持、讀、說 是《法華經》。
今當推求 堅實法財，
王云何直爾 欲得聞知？’
時夜叉鬼 食妻子盡。
遣使頒示 閻浮提內，
云何直爾 便欲得聞？’
告語一切 閻浮提內。
虔闍婆梨 大國王者，
卻後七日， 為於法故，
若於身上 剜千燈者，
云何為此 一婆羅門，
棄此世界 一切眾生？’
入於涅槃 而不說法？”
獨將阿難 入城乞食。
贊說如來 若干德行，
其人持一 小阿輸提， 往至蛇所，
無有眼耳 舌及手足，
賑濟貧乏 及諸孤老。
儻為惡鬼 猛獸見害。
正使今得 百車珍寶，
爾時世尊 知須達來，
不知禮拜 供養之法。
爾時世尊 即為說法：
唯願世尊 使一弟子 共往敕示。”
便敕使人 象負金出。
聽我徒眾 與共捔術！
不能動吾 足上一毛：
泉池樹木 花果茂盛。
須達手自 捉繩一頭。
即問：“尊者 何故憂色。”
唯願大王 遣使請佛。”
今人主非使賞罰之威利出於己也，
今人主非使賞罰之威利出於己也，
短長、大小、方圓、堅脆、輕重、白黑之謂理。
短長、大小、方圓、堅脆、輕重、白黑之謂理。

tls:span.tls:note: The figure comes at a crucial dramatic moment.
兕虎 . 兕 is rising tone.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 民獨知兕虎之有爪角也，
民獨知兕虎之有爪角也，
而莫知萬物之盡有爪角也，

tls:span.tls:note: 戶牖 . Note that 戶 has rising tone.
山川 . There is no question of rhyme.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 尸祝不越樽俎而代之矣。
聾者无以與乎鐘鼓之聲。

tls:span.tls:note: 常當 "one should always" and NOT: "it is always the case that one should"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而獨不見之調調，之刁刁乎？」

tls:span.tls:note: 作是念已 repeats 而作是念 and here again the order is not arbitary, obviously.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此固以失霸王之道一矣。

tls:span.tls:note: 霸王之名可成。而謀臣不為，引軍而退，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天下固以量秦之謀臣一矣。
淨心念摩訶般若波羅蜜法。

tls:span.tls:note: This long entry seems remarkably unadorned.
I suppose one might insist on ISOCOLON. Still, the case remains interesting in the context of 白文 .

tls:text.tls:srcline: 叔孫武叔語大夫於朝曰：

tls:span.tls:note: There is no exact structural parallelism between these two phrases, but the presence of 為 makes it clear that they are intended to look similar.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「我以欲得彼之錢財認之為兄。
「若是汝之祖父已來所有衣者，
是時木匠即便經地壘墼作樓。
何有不作最下重屋而得造彼第二之屋。
「汝今喜瞋倉卒之相即時現驗！

tls:span.tls:note: Narrative juncture. This could easily be taken as ENJAMBEMENT-MULTIPLE.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 善知識師以方便故教令坐禪觀十二緣起。
「不如發心求聲聞果速斷生死作阿羅漢。」
還復念其妻子眷屬世間之事五欲之樂。
乃為外道邪惡妖女之所欺誑：
汝可為我雇倩瓦師詣市覓之。」
此弊惡驢須臾之頃盡破我器。
「我為方便勤苦積年始得成器。
瓦師久時所作瓦器少時能破。」
如來法王有持戒樹能生勝果。
如來法王有持戒樹能生勝果。
失諸功德禪定道品無漏諸善。
失諸功德禪定道品無漏諸善。
若犯一戒不生慚愧清淨懺悔。
「我此篋者能出一切衣服飲食床褥臥具資生之物盡從中出。
駝上所載多有珍寶細軟上氈種種雜物。
天雨溼爛喻於放逸敗壞善行。
領此世界 八萬四千 諸小國邑、
是時宮中 二萬夫人、 五百太子、 一萬大臣，
麤腳利角 [爬-巴+包]地大吼 奔突來前。
爾時世尊 與諸四眾 前後圍遶 放大光明 震動大地 至舍衛國。
應當與號 太子祇樹 給孤獨園。
子問公叔文子於公明賈，
子夏之門人問交於子張。

tls:span.tls:note: Deviating caesura in lines 3 and 4: elsewhere caesura after second character.
有為 / 無為 / 實 / 不實
Note the direct address with 汝 in the next line.
Note that by omission of the 而 one could easily have achieved rhythmic regularity, but ARHYTHMIA in transcription is so common that there is no attempt to avoid it.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 菩薩、摩訶薩 於後惡世 云何能說是經？”�
一時 佛在摩竭國 善勝道場 初始得佛，

tls:span.tls:note: Opening formula in direct speech, with transcription.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 時毘沙門王 還複本形，
時有婆羅門， 名勞度差，
化作婆羅門 來詣宮門，
時婆羅門即便 為說此偈：
爾時 波羅奈國 有五百仙士，

tls:span.tls:note: Note that the irregularity is in the phrase without the transcription, though.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是時郁多羅 聞此語已，
王所住城 號提婆拔提，

tls:span.tls:note: 聚落 contracted? A loan-word? 待考

tls:text.tls:srcline: 一時佛在 舍衛國祗樹 給孤獨園。
便請五戒優婆塞 共入大海。
時波斯匿王 跪白佛言：
“諸大德比丘 宿與如來 有何因緣？
爾時國中 有一大仙士 名羼提波梨，
見羼提波梨 端坐思維，
時波斯匿王 住法平整，
即為作字 名曼慈毗梨。
從弟尸羅世質 多舉錢財 以供多須。
“夫人，我本 從尸羅世質 舉少錢財，
不知禮拜 供養之法。
唯舍利弗 是婆羅門種，
欲為瞿曇沙門 興立精舍。
欲為瞿曇沙門 起立精舍，
求共沙門弟子 捔其伎術。
是時須達 至舍利弗所，
時舍利弗 自化其身 作毘沙門王。
唯舍利弗邊 涼冷無火。
有一生補 處菩薩來 check text???生其中，
其餘則日月至焉而已矣。」

tls:span.tls:note: 日月 . Additive, with motivated order.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 唯夫能令人不見其事極，
則群臣不得朋黨相為矣。

tls:span.tls:note: 號令不治 / 賞罰不信 / 地形不便 . Note that what follows is a deviating longer phrase.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是以明君守始以知萬物之源，

tls:span.tls:note: Striking three-character isocolon with close parallelism and two tripartite repetitions.
How is one to handle minor but significant differences like these? Should one call this cases APPROXIMATE?
As is regular, the last member forms a CRESCENDO.
A complicated case involving what one might call an elaborate repetititve CRESCENDO.
Note, however, the structural contrast between 朋友 and 事君 .
Note the"structural EPIPHORA" with both phrases ending in an asyndeton.
Ellipsis of subject in second line in order to save ISOCOLON.
Note that the ISOCOLON is perfect, while the parallelism increases in in complexity in each of the two tricola that are related.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 瞽者无以與乎文章之觀，
聾者无以與乎鐘鼓之聲。

tls:span.tls:note: Note that the ISOCOLON is maintained in lines 13 and 14 as well.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 庸詎知吾所謂知之非不知邪？
予惡乎知說生之非惑邪！
予惡乎知惡死之非弱喪
不與小女、處女、寡女等共語；

tls:span.tls:note: 吾聞 is supernumerary, but this is standard in many contexts.
This is common with phrases introducing direct speech, and also editorial remarks.
The caesura is in an asymmetric place
Again, the 無所有 is hard to avoid, enforced by the logic of the argument.
Note that the sentence object is again regular. But the pattern is not predictable, hence not regarded as an ARHYTHMIA-REGULAR.
Dramatising and emphasising the unreasonable action taken.
Marks the beginning of a crucial reflection which is a turning-point in the narrative.
Marks end of the scene-setting narrative.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而此人者道我恆喜瞋恚作事倉卒。

tls:span.tls:note: Note the presence here as so often, of a binome which can sometimes apparently be treated as "monosyllabic" for metric purposes.
It seems significant that arhythmia of this obviously convenient kind is not more common than it is in BAIYU.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 由是之故失其功德之火持戒之水。

tls:span.tls:note: The need for 有 is motivated by the need to avoid a generic reading of 愚人 as "the fool".
In narrative, end of narrative mode. Possibly, 兜羅 was read in a contracted manner.
Beginning of a narrative juncture, a thought.
Narrative juncture: last phrase. The juncture is also marked by the formulaic 時 "At that time"
The 此 is perhaps spurious. But note the recurrence of the ARHYTHMIA in line 11.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而此五陰恆以生老病死無量苦惱搒笞眾生。
是不可思議 現希有事。
文殊師利法王子菩薩、摩訶薩白佛言：
六萬山川 八千億聚落。

tls:span.tls:note: 聚落 seems to be taken as a contracted binome, as in transcriptions.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 王云何直爾 欲得聞知？’

tls:span.tls:note: 云何 is apparently read as a contracted binome.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 爾時大王以所愛夫人及兒中勝者供養夜叉。
當以智慧光明照悟眾生結縛黑暗。’
爾時大王即遣使者乘八萬里象，

tls:span.tls:note: 也 supernumerary at end of direct speech.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 世尊，往昔 於眾生 不顧身命，
各持寶物 並海神所寄 奉佛及僧。
舉家恆共供養一辟支佛，
“不審，世尊，此金財比丘本造何福，
與五百弟子 處於山林，
時仙人五百弟子飛於虛空，
坐以塵土糞穢而以坌之。
“世尊， 彼長者子 以何因緣，
時長者子聞其船壞空歸，
即嚴好馬、眾寶、服飾、寶衣，
能為眾生 作良祐福田，

tls:span.tls:note: Unnecessary and deliberate: no need for the 也 . Emphatic start of direct speech.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不如轉足 一步往趣世尊。
譬如 淨潔白疊 易染為色。

tls:span.tls:note: Note that caesura is before the quatrain.

tls:text.tls:srcline: “我今 欲為如來 起立精舍。

tls:span.tls:note: Shi1zi3 is apparently read as monosyllabic.

tls:text.tls:srcline: “汝今 見此地中 蟻子不耶。”
凡百二十處 別打犍椎。
有得須陀洹、斯陀含、阿那含、阿羅漢者。

tls:span.tls:note: Construtions are different but rhythmic stress pattern similar. Worth studying.
At this crucial juncture the colloquial copula 是 is used.
Triple: 禽其身 / 據其地 / 有其民
牛乳 : three times, once involving in addition ANADIPLOSIS.
修行 as the crucial concept.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則群臣之情態得其資矣。

tls:span.tls:note: 道 . This could be omitted as being part of the ISOCOLON-PARALLELK+REPETITIO SYNDROME in lines 1-4.
我／吾 . The persistent use of the first person pronoun is a striking feature of this. I suspect this repetition is more a feature of informal colloquial rhetoric than literary rhetoric.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其時座下僧尼、道俗一萬餘人，
韶州刺史韋璩及諸官僚三十餘人、儒士三十餘人，

tls:span.tls:note: 宮室 / 臺榭 / 陂池

tls:text.tls:srcline: 如是一切所有財物盡皆破之而作二分。

tls:span.tls:note: 一切 所有 盡皆
號令賞罰 / 地形利害
Note the last member deviates structurally. One might even take lines 8 and 9 as one single deviant line forming a striking case of CRESCENDO.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則一國之人皆畏其臣而易其君，
今人主非使賞罰之威利出於己也，

tls:span.tls:note: But note that the second member continues syntactically. We may need a special term for this kind of enjambement.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今所以給軍之具於牸馬近臣。

tls:span.tls:note: 而 is not taken as a case of REPETITIO, and it is to be noted that the word has markedly different meainings in the two members of this ISOCOLON.
Confucius is, of course quite serious about the arts. But in this playfully humble piece of ironical discourse he exaggerates the secondariness of yi4 藝 .
此亦復爾 : this is the standard conclusion of the general discussion which follows each tale.
而作是念 : very common formula

The last member, lines 3-5 is unusually long, so long in fact that one might want to refuse to speak of a TRICOLON here. But I believe it is useful to regard this as a limiting case. The rhyme, in any case, supports our analysis.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則不能免人間法令之禍。

tls:span.tls:note: The last member only is elaborated.
Tripartite construction, the crescendo is 君子 versus 樂／說 . The first two members begin with verbs, the last with a noun.
Marginal case, but note the biverbal structure in the last member.
Third member consists of two members.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 四者孰知天下之正色哉？
若能修行善行及以布施持戒禪定。
其時座下僧尼、道俗一萬餘人，

tls:span.tls:note: Possible case only. And what worries is the preponderance of such.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 气至七日己巳允㞢來㛸自西。

tls:span.tls:note: This is not, of course, simply a rhetorical device.
Probably the relative clause includes the next line.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 時有夫妻二人 貧餓困乏，
衛莊公娶于齊東宮得臣之妹，
鄭有叔詹、堵叔、師叔三良為政，

tls:span.tls:note: 義夫 1. faithful husband; 2. fighter for justice
If this really is a rhetorical question it is very unusual in structure.
Marginal case of conclusion, since he continues.
These things are supposed not to provide proper peace of mind.
道 is played upon in two different meanings.
名 is used as noun and verb.
和 is used as nab and as vi - act.
知 . Note that the final occurrence is nominal. Hence this is not a simple case of REPETITIO.
Deliberate paradox involving the cognates 人／仁 .

tls:text.tls:srcline: 己獨何為密密十年難乎？”
己獨何為密密十年難乎？”
駝上所載多有珍寶細軟上氈種種雜物。
潤濟開導 今正是時。

tls:span.tls:note: 一舉／二國 is not a regular case of ANADIPLOSIS, but it is usefully compared to regular cases.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 以為不當名也害甚於大功，

tls:span.tls:note: The order of these statements is obligatory: the arsis has to precede the thesis. The effect created is that of CRESCENDO.
信是己婦 is the subjective misjudgment of the cuckold.
This is of course, in a sense, concluding, but it is in fact part of an ISOCOLON.
不能 is used in two contrasting meanings and syntactic frames.
I take it that Ze1ngzi3 is being deliberately aenigmatic.
This appears to be deliberately and provocatively enigmatic. However, there is always the chance that the pragmatic context would have disambiguated this painlessly.
This is a deliberately enigmatic witty explanation which deliberately disappoints the questioner who was hoping for a more informative and helpful answer.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 一曰文、二曰武、三曰威、四曰德，

tls:span.tls:note: 文 / 武 // 威 / 德
肯聽習問知 / 問知而聽能
Note that the two problematic cases of CHIASMUS are manifestly placed together for their rhetorical similarity.
It does not say 好學不如丘 .
I am NOT saying that this is a valid case. But it deserves consideration when the matter is under discussion.
Again a problematic and perhaps even irrelevant case, but it is worth keepingin mind.
堅 goes with 革 and 利 goes with 兵 . Perhaps the order is euphonically motivated.
鄭人 1. the people of Zhe4ng; 2. 鄭人 "a man from Zhe4ng"
Three phrases begin in 不亦 .
願 . See continuation for third member. This is a special case of triple ANAPHORA in which the last member almost humorously picks up the pattern of the first.
不 . Third member strongly deviating. There really only is double anaphora in some sense. The third member looks almost accidental.
Last member approximate. Note the pattern 通／用／庸／／庸／用／通
大 : five members! An unusual number.
或日 ; note the categorial repetition of number.
夫子 ... 之與 One wonders whether this was intended, but perhaps it is worth recording, if only to see to what extent this figure was cultivated in Chinese elegant prose.
二柄 . Probably, one should disregard final particles when attributing this form.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 先物行先理動之謂前識。
凡失其所欲之路而妄行者之謂迷，
迷則不能至於其所欲至矣。
則愚民不得無術而效之；

tls:span.tls:note: 玄 ends line 11 and begins line 12.
Why is one so sure that this is not ANAPHORA?
自諸侯出 . Note how the anadiplosis links two cases of elaborate isocolon.
求之 , between what must be two stanzas!

tls:text.tls:srcline: 菩薩、摩訶薩不親近國王、王子、大臣、官長；
有能一日用其力於仁矣乎？
韶州刺史韋璩及諸官僚三十餘人、儒士三十餘人，
自天地之剖判以至于今。

tls:span.tls:note: Probably, this does not refer to just two groups of barbarians, but to the barbarians generally, so that this is etymologically additive, but not really semantically so. Examples of this sort are many.
文德 . Possibly this is a case of modification.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 明天著忠臣孝子之義也。
明天著忠臣孝子之義也。
由賢人不至而忠臣不用也；

tls:span.tls:note: 陰燕陽魏 / 連荊固齊，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「唯願為我除此無常生死之患，
夫為學者研思精微博通多識。

tls:span.tls:note: 無名 is extraordinarily used as a noun phrase.
有名 is used extraordinarily as a noun phrase.
君子 must be verbal "deserve the name of a gentleman, be gentlemanly" in the frame of 不亦 x 乎 , since all caes of this pattern are verbal. The the subject is, in any case, a nominalised verb phrase.
The text plays with the character 樂 .

荇菜 : but note that for pre-Han texts the standardisation of the presence of radicals in received texts is misleading. Epigraphic evidence shows that radicals were absent then and became standard in Han recensions.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而獨不見之調調，之刁刁乎？」

tls:span.tls:note: He appeared as some stranger to Xi Zhi.
名可名 begins and ends in 名 .
玄 begins and ends line 12 (and mirrors the pattern of lines 1-4).;
One should consider whether this is not just an afterthought, but perhaps a delimitation of what was generalised about above.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫為學者研思精微博通多識。

tls:span.tls:note: These opening constructions in 有 are always problematic.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 爾時梵天 復更傾倒，
又諸眾生 應可度者 亦甚眾多。
毘沙門王 見其如是，
時勞度差 復報王曰：
見於菩薩 作法供養，
時舍利弗 慘然憂色。
大旱金石流土山焦而不熱。
故（固）以無為無思為虛也。

tls:span.tls:note: Note that the last member does not really belong in the series.
至 . Note that there is no KUKLOS.
譬 如： the order not being arbitrary in these cases.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 又不親近求聲聞比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，
則其下所以為上者薄也。

tls:span.tls:note: 羨 / 溢 : note that here as often the easier variant comes last/second.
少私寡欲 possibly double variatio!
Striking case of VARIATIO for dramatic intensive effect.
The variation 說／樂 is deliberate and not semantically arbitrary, 樂 being more social in meaning. Thus we include in VARIATIO cases where the variation is semantically motivated.
無 and 勿 seem to be used interchangeably in order to avoid undresired REPETITIO. (REPETITIO of 不 is a special case which it would be pedantiic to note: it is unavoidable.)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吾無行而不與二三子者，
自生以來 多財饒寶，

tls:span.tls:note: 咸／皆。 See also 悉 and 盡 above.
以言死： the point is they do NOT die.
Zilu seems to pick up humorously the pattern of what precedes. This is NOT a case of irony, but it may usefully be considered in the context of irony.
"You see, I'm not really a gentleman, am I?"
"Humble" is not what he was, literally. In any case he had a distant aristocratic background. But of course he was not yet devoted to the pure pursuit of the Way....
鯤 is the name of fish-spawn. There is a complex kind of profound irony in the use of this word as a name for a giant fish.
我未見 , 我未之見 . Confucius seems to dwell on the idea so as to produce something or a COMMORATIO even.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而莫知萬物之盡有爪角也，
聖人盡隨於萬物之規矩，

tls:span.tls:note: 建 . NOTE THAT THESE PHENOMENA ARE CAPTURED BY THE SEMANTIC CATEGORY "FIG".

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則夫子猶有蓬之心也夫！」
則夫子猶有蓬之心也夫！」

tls:span.tls:note: Is this disjunctive? Cases like this need close analysis.
Disputable, hence in two lines: the preposed-object construction may be taken as fully verbal, as in the translation.
The ENJAMBEMENT marks the end of the dialogue.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 以此義當知各各自業所造非梵天能造。

tls:span.tls:note: 知各各自 / 業所造非 enjambement breaking up a word!!
line 1 has a subject, and line 2 has a predicate
complex resultative verb ( 來到 ) is split by a line-break
the object of the copula 名為 comes after the line break
the object of 行 is in the next line
有為無為實不實 modifies 法
the object of 名為 is in the next line
the modifier 智者 modifies the head of the next line
除 has two objects in two consecutive lines

tls:text.tls:srcline: 如我伴輩 聞法易染 更有如我比不。”
予惡乎知惡死之非弱喪

tls:span.tls:note: Having said 弗如也 Confucius feels he needs to be more explicit.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 有能一日用其力於仁矣乎？

tls:span.tls:note: 有能一日用其力於仁矣乎？

tls:text.tls:srcline: 何不樹之於无何有之鄉，
而未知吾所謂之其果有謂乎，

tls:span.tls:note: 泥洹 used verbally at least three times.
亡 used in a highly unusual abstract meaning.
從： nominalised. Should this count as ANTHIMERIA? Probably not. But we leave it for consideration in the context of methodological discussions on this difficult category.
道 in 可道 is used in a derived verbal function, a 活用 .
妙 , usually verbal, is extraordinarily used as a noun.

The derived transitive use of 主 is morphologically unmarked. If it were marked, of course, we would have no ANTHIMERIA. The borderline between ANTHIMERIA on the one hand and the ordinary employment of a somewhat rare morphologically unmarked derived meaning of a word is systematically unclear. One may simply take ad hoc rhetorical ANTHIMERIA to be one of the sources for the derivation of new lexeme entries.
宗 . It is rhetorically significant that the speech ends on this enigmatic note.
弋 . This does not constitute a literary device.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 爾時梵天 知佛所念，

tls:span.tls:note: 我見 is supernumerary, as one can predict. What follows is regular.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 我見十方諸佛不生不死，

tls:span.tls:note: 我見 is supernumerary, as one can predict. What follows is regular.
Note that Confucius does not presuppose, but asserts the "waylessless" of the ruler of We4y.
This is not, technically, indirect speech. But it will be interesting to keep it in mind as one discusses the evolution of the form.
言楚之善變也 . Not an indisputable case, but a fine example of periphrasic means of representing essentially indirect speech.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 伯達、伯适、仲突、仲忽、叔夜、叔夏、季隨、季騧。

tls:span.tls:note: 孝乎惟孝 is not indisputably composed of two sentences, but we classify it under this category as an early POSSIBLE example.
知／守／為天下／為天下／常／復歸於 This is a remarkable extended multiple case.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不若以非馬喻馬之非馬也。

tls:span.tls:note: 臣 and 竊 are self-deprecatory.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 臣竊願陛下之幸熟圖之！
豈陛下所以逆賤臣者邪？
則雖欲察賤臣愚忠之計，
若臣斯之所言有不應事實者，
願大王幸使得畢辭於前，
或為縣官水火盜賊之所侵奪，
汝可齎一死婦女屍安著屋中。
老母於後伺其夫主不在之時，
云何頃來而不造作如是之樓？」
其猶外道不滅煩惱熾然之火，

tls:span.tls:note: Marks beginning of the buddhological discussion.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聞他宿舊沙門婆羅門有大名德
於此燒處當使汝得上妙欽服。
乃為外道邪惡妖女之所欺誑：
而為生死魔王債主之所纏著。
聞有沙門婆羅門等世之良醫善療眾患，
種種求覓長存之處終不能得。
「我此篋者能出一切衣服飲食床褥臥具資生之物盡從中出。
執此杖者怨敵歸服無敢與諍。
著此屐者能令人飛行無罣礙。」
此人即時抱篋捉杖躡屐而飛。
諸魔外道諍篋者喻於有漏中強求果報。

tls:span.tls:note: A truly extreme case in which one begins to doubt whether the fact that the number of characters is a mulitiple of four is coincidental.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其夫先來常善能作鴛鴦之鳴。
遙見風吹大樹枝柯動搖上下，
而彼仙人尋即取米及胡麻子。
‘若以大王 所愛妻子 與我食者，
於高座上 眾會之中 取而食之。
今當推求 妙寶法財 以利益之。’
‘大王今日 能于身上 剜燃千燈，
‘今此世界 有命之類 依侍大王，
三寶因是 乃現於世。
一時佛在 舍衛國祗樹 給孤獨園。
爾時世尊 乞食時到 著衣持缽，
“此三人者 非但今日 蒙我得活；
“不以眼耳 鼻舌手足 等而為財主，
即持一寶 珠到平事 婦所白言：
欲得極妙 容姿端政 有相之女，
次第度舍 利弗目連 徒眾五百 亦得應真。
時舍利弗 便昇須達 所敷之座。
時舍利弗 化作一大 六牙白象。
時舍利弗 即便化作 金剛力士。
時舍利弗 便化作一 金翅鳥王，
須達悉見 六欲天中 嚴淨宮殿。
即遣使者 詣王舍城 請佛及僧：
爾時世尊 與諸四眾 前後圍遶 放大光明 震動大地 至舍衛國。
放大光明 遍照三千 大千世界。

tls:span.tls:note: The intrasentential 矣 is a striking sign of the INVERSIO.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舜禹之有天下也而不與焉。」

tls:span.tls:note: 久矣哉， 由之行詐也！

tls:text.tls:srcline: 二曰：天生陰陽寒暑燥濕，

tls:span.tls:note: A steep slope serves as a parable for the harshness of sanctions, which are made explicit eight lines further down in the form of the strict application of penalties (shen fa 深罰).

A steep slope serves as extended metaphor (metaphora continuata) for the harshness of sanctions, which are made explicit eight lines further down in the form of the strict application of penalties (shen fa 深罰).
